ovdesc.p: This screen is to store reachability of another bank through the CHATS clearing.Clearing House Automated Transfer System, or CHATS, is a Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) system for the transfer of funds in Hong Kong.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.CHATSDIRECTORY

desc.p: Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
